Question
========

You sell contents insurance. If a burglary occurs, € 7000 to be paid out. Research shows that there are 46.9 burglaries per 1,000 households. What does your insurance have to cost to make a profit?

Answerlist
----------

* Less than €328.30
* More than € 328.30
* Less than € 7000
* More than € 7000

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Less than € 328.30: Incorrect
* More than € 328,30: Correct
* Less than € 7000: Incorrect
* More than € 7000: Incorrect
